languages.text: This mechanism is immune to {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}disturbed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} effects, and Horrors of the Warp and {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g}. It also cannot be {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushed{/g}. Its armour and deflection become equal to its TGH and TGH bonus, respectively. All incoming shock damage is increased by +30%.
languages.original_text: Этот механизм невосприимчив к {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокидыванию{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}утомлению{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}тревожности{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}замешательству{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}ошеломлению{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечению{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}отравлению{/g}, а также ужасам варпа и {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}психическому урону{/g}. Его нельзя {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}оттолкнуть{/g}. Его броня и отражение урона становятся равны его ВЫН и бонусу ВЫН соответственно. Весь получаемый электрический урон увеличивается на 30%.

traits.locale_text: This mechanism is immune to {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}disturbed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} effects, and Horrors of the Warp and {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g}. It also cannot be pushed. Its {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} become equal to its {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}. All incoming {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}shock damage{/g} is increased by +30%.

This mechanism is immune to {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}disturbed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} effects, and Horrors of the Warp and {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g}. It also cannot be {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushed{/g}. Its armour and deflection become equal to its TGH and TGH bonus, respectively. All incoming shock damage is increased by +30%.

This mechanism is immune to {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}disturbed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} effects, and Horrors of the Warp and {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g}. It also cannot be {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushed{/g}. Its armour and deflection become equal to its TGH and TGH bonus, respectively. All incoming shock damage is increased by +30%.

languages.text: Этот механизм невосприимчив к {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокидыванию{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}утомлению{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}тревожности{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}замешательству{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}ошеломлению{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечению{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}отравлению{/g}, а также ужасам варпа и {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}психическому урону{/g}. Его нельзя {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}оттолкнуть{/g}. Его броня и отражение урона становятся равны его ВЫН и бонусу ВЫН соответственно. Весь получаемый электрический урон увеличивается на 30%.

Dieser Mechanismus ist immun gegen die Effekte {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Hingestreckt{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}Erschöpft{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}Verstört{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}Überrascht{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Taumelnd{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Gift{/g} sowie gegen Schrecken des Warp und {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}Mentalschaden{/g}. Darüber hinaus kann sie nicht {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}weggestoßen{/g} werden. Ihre {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Deflektion{/g} wird {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}ZÄH{/g} und ZÄH-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} angeglichen. Erlittener {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}Schockschaden{/g} erhöht sich um +30 %.
languages.original_text: This mechanism is immune to {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}disturbed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} effects, and Horrors of the Warp and {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g}. It also cannot be {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushed{/g}. Its armour and deflection become equal to its TGH and TGH bonus, respectively. All incoming shock damage is increased by +30%.

traits.locale_text: Dieser Mechanismus ist immun gegen die Effekte {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Hingestreckt{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}Erschöpft{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}Verstört{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}Überrascht{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Taumelnd{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Gift{/g}, außerdem gegen Schrecken des Warp und {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}Mentalschaden{/g}. Darüber hinaus kann sie nicht weggestoßen werden. Ihre {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}Rüstung{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Deflektion{/g} wird ihrem {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}ZÄH{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} angeglichen. Jeder eingehende {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}Schockschaden{/g} erhöht sich um +30 %.

Dieser Mechanismus ist immun gegen die Effekte {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Hingestreckt{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}Erschöpft{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}Verstört{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}Überrascht{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Taumelnd{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Gift{/g}, außerdem gegen Schrecken des Warp und {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}Mentalschaden{/g}. Darüber hinaus kann sie nicht {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}weggestoßen{/g} werden. Ihre {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Deflektion{/g} wird {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}ZÄH{/g} und ZÄH-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} angeglichen. Jeder eingehende {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}Schockschaden{/g} erhöht sich um +30 %.

languages.text: Ce mécanisme est insensible aux effets {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Paralysie{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}Fatigue{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}Perturbation{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}Perplexité{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Sidération{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxine{/g} ainsi qu'aux Horreurs du Warp et aux {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}dégâts mentaux{/g}. Il ne peut pas non plus être {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}repoussé{/g}. Son armure et sa Déflexion sont respectivement égales à son END et à son bonus d'END. Tous les dégâts d'électrocution subis sont augmentés de +30 %.
languages.original_text: This mechanism is immune to {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}disturbed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} effects, and Horrors of the Warp and {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g}. It also cannot be {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushed{/g}. Its armour and deflection become equal to its TGH and TGH bonus, respectively. All incoming shock damage is increased by +30%.

traits.locale_text: Ce mécanisme est insensible aux effets {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Paralysie{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}Fatigue{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}Perturbation{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}Perplexité{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Sidération{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxine{/g} ainsi qu'aux Horreurs du Warp et aux {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}dégâts mentaux{/g}. Il ne peut pas non plus être {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}repoussé{/g}. Son armure et sa Déflexion sont respectivement égales à son END et à son bonus d'END. Tous les dégâts d'électrocution subis sont augmentés de +30 %.

Ce mécanisme est invulnérable aux effets {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Paralysie{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}Fatigue{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}Perturbation{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}Perplexité{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Sidération{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxine{/g} ainsi qu'à Horreurs du Warp et aux {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}dégâts mentaux{/g}. Il ne peut pas non plus être {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}repoussé{/g}. Ses valeurs d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g} sont égales à son {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}E{/g} et à son {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} d’E, respectivement. Une augmentation de +30 % s'applique à tous les {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}dégâts d'électrocution{/g} subis.

Ce mécanisme est insensible aux effets {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Paralysie{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}Fatigue{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}Perturbation{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}Perplexité{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Sidération{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxine{/g} ainsi qu'aux Horreurs du Warp et aux {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}dégâts mentaux{/g}. Il ne peut pas non plus être {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}repoussé{/g}. Son armure et sa Déflexion sont respectivement égales à son END et à son bonus d'END. Tous les dégâts d'électrocution subis sont augmentés de +30 %.

languages.text: 此机械免疫{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}倒地{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}疲劳{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}惊扰{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}困惑{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}恐慌{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}效果，以及亚空间的恐怖与{g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}精神伤害{/g}。此机械也无法被{g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}推开{/g}。它的护甲等同于坚韧，偏转等同于坚韧加值。 它受到的所有电击伤害提高30%。
languages.original_text: This mechanism is immune to {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}disturbed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} effects, and Horrors of the Warp and {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g}. It also cannot be {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushed{/g}. Its armour and deflection become equal to its TGH and TGH bonus, respectively. All incoming shock damage is increased by +30%.

traits.locale_text: 此机械免疫{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}倒地{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}疲劳{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}惊扰{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}困惑{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}恐慌{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}效果，以及亚空间的恐怖与{g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}精神伤害{/g}。此机械也无法被{g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}推开{/g}。它的护甲等同于坚韧，偏转等同于坚韧加值。 它受到的所有电击伤害提高30%。

此机械免疫{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}倒地{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}疲劳{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}惊扰{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}困惑{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}恐慌{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}效果，以及亚空间的恐怖与{g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}精神伤害{/g}。此机械也无法被{g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}推开{/g}。它的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}等同于{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}，{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}等同于坚韧{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}。 它受到的所有{g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}电击伤害{/g}提高30%。

languages.text: Este mecanismo es inmune a los efectos {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}derribado{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigado{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}perturbado{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplejo{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}desequilibrado{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxina{/g}, así como a los horrores de la disformidad y al {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}daño mental{/g}. Tampoco se le puede {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}empujar{/g}. Su armadura y desvío son iguales a su RES y su bonificación por RES respectivamente. Todo el daño de conmoción que recibe aumenta un +30 %.
languages.original_text: This mechanism is immune to {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}disturbed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} effects, and Horrors of the Warp and {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g}. It also cannot be {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushed{/g}. Its armour and deflection become equal to its TGH and TGH bonus, respectively. All incoming shock damage is increased by +30%.

Este mecanismo es inmune a los efectos {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}derribado{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigado{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}perturbado{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplejo{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}desequilibrado{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxina{/g}, así como a los horrores de la disformidad y al {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}daño mental{/g}. Tampoco se le puede {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}empujar{/g}. Su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} son iguales a su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}RES{/g} y su {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por RES respectivamente. Todo el {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}daño de conmoción{/g} que recibe aumenta un +30 %.

languages.text: この仕組みは、{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}脆弱化{/g}や{g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}疲労{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}動揺{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}混乱{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}よろけ{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}の効果、そして<歪み>のホラーおよび{g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}精神的ダメージ{/g}の影響を受けない。また、これを{g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}押し付けること{/g}もできない。この{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}ディフレクション{/g}は、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}と同等となる。 受ける{g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}ショックダメージ{/g}すべてが +30%上昇する。
languages.original_text: This mechanism is immune to {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}disturbed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} effects, and Horrors of the Warp and {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}mental damage{/g}. It also cannot be {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushed{/g}. Its armour and deflection become equal to its TGH and TGH bonus, respectively. All incoming shock damage is increased by +30%.

traits.locale_text: この仕組みは、{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}脆弱化{/g}や{g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}疲労{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}動揺{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}混乱{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}よろけ{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒{/g}の効果、そして<歪み>のホラーおよび{g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}精神的ダメージ{/g}の影響を受けない。また、これを押し付けることもできない。この{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}アーマー{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏向{/g}は、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}と同等となる。 受ける{g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}ショックダメージ{/g}すべてが +30%上昇する。

languages.text: Bu mekanizma; {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}yere devrilme{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}yorgunluk{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}kaygı{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}şaşkınlık{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}afallama{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}kan kaybetme{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toksin{/g} etkilerine, Öteboyut Dehşetlerine ve {g|Encyclopedia:MentalDamage}zihinsel hasara{/g} karşı bağışıklıktır. Ayrıca {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}itilmesi{/g} mümkün değildir. Zırh ve saptırma değerleri, sırasıyla DAY and DAY bonusu değerlerine eşittir. Gelen tüm şok hasarları +%30 artar.

It also cannot be {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushed{/g}. Its armour and deflection become equal to its TGH and TGH bonus, respectively. All incoming shock damage is increased by +30%.
